Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe looks a little stunned when you hand him the mystery box.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You went all this way to give me this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Isn't that a little... And I thought it was some kind of emergency.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He stares at the gift for a few seconds before sighing resignedly and opening it.'}
{3: 'There is a wooden music box inside. Watanabe winds it up, and the music box starts playing a lullaby about stars.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...I haven't seen something like this for a very long time. The kids in the Oasis will love it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I was wondering why the kids kept asking for stories about immortals visiting our realms. They must have heard something from the adults.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you need a storyteller? I can improvise with you.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't say no to such an offer, can I? Not to mention that you haven't been here for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Take a good look, then. Isn't the Oasis today a little closer to the Eden in our dream?", 4: '1'}
